resources.string:
DroidVeggies comes with absolutely no warranty.

You use this software on your own risk.
The developer is not responsible for any damages caused by DroidVeggies or its usage.
It is only the users responsibility to check his countrys laws in order to make sure that the usage of DroidVeggies is permitted by law in his country. In some countries stealing someones identity might be prohibited by law.

Always think about what you are doing! Stealing someones identity can cause real trouble! So basically I am not responsible and cannot be held accountable for how YOU choose to use this tool.

YOUR DEVICE SEEMS TO BE UN-ROOTED\n\nDroidVeggies can only run on rooted devices. So if the device is not rooted and DroidVeggies does not work properly, please do not ask for support! Nevertheless, DroidVeggies will start for compatibility reasons
I understand and accept the disclaimer
Wifi connection lost or changed. Stopped Listening!
Busybox should be installed in order to run DroidVeggies properly. Do you want to install BusyBox from Google Play?
Do you really want to delete all hosts from blacklist?
You must accept this disclaimer in order to use DroidVeggies!
Do you really want to exit? Allow background processing by pressing HOME.

This will start a debug session. It will start Listening and collect debug information. Let DroidVeggies keep listening for some seconds (at least 30) and press "stop". An email will open which contains all debug information. No data will be sent silently!
There is an update available!\nWould you like to automatically download the new version?
Choose custom URL to load with hijacked cookies

DroidVeggies, Network Penetration and Administration re-imagined and redesigned. 

DroidVeggies is Open Source and forked from the DroidSteal project 

Version 1.3.2 

For use only on networks that you have permission for.
